nodes.text: Hoof fungus was a disease that could affect pack animals such as yubals. It constituted fungal growth on the hooves of the affected animals' feet.

When Senior Aide Xodlak'ji'iprip approached rancher Xodlak'phr'ooa around 18 BBY to host the Agbui led by Haplif, the rancher informed the woman that everyone in their district of Redhill province knew about her. Lakjiip smiled widely at her recognition, at which point Lakphro mused that everyone in the district also knows about hoof fungus, so his remark wasn’t necessarily a compliment.
